title: Project Magnum
description: Co-investment with BlackRock and CDR in the takeover of WM Morrisons Supermarkets plc.

substances.description: With almost 500 supermarkets, the company owns 86% of its retail sites, which is materially above the industry average, providing additional proceeds though sale and leasebacks.

otherInfo.title: Leading food retailer chain in the UK

substances.description: The company has a vertically integrated supply chain with 9% market share and strong brand awareness.
Highly regarded team restored profitable growth since 2015.
